languages.text: "Кьява Гамма пала. "Рожденный в огне" покинул орбиту планеты под огнем неизвестного врага и отступил из системы", — формально, как во время доклада вышестоящим, произнесла капитан ван Дейн на записи. "Мы столкнулись с патологической {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-активностью, экипаж рапортует о сбоях в системе поля Геллера. Корабль обречен. Тех, кто найдет эту запись, я прошу отслужить молебен за наши души. Я также прошу забрать фамильные реликвии рода ван Дейн с Кьявы Гамма. Реликвии хранятся..." — и капитан сообщила место и код фамильного хранилища.

traits.locale_text: "Кьява Гамма пала. "Рожденный в огне" покинул орбиту планеты под огнем неизвестного врага и отступил из системы", — формально, как во время доклада вышестоящим, произнесла капитан ван Дейн на записи. "Мы столкнулись с патологической варп-активностью, экипаж рапортует о сбоях в системе поля Геллера. Корабль обречен. Тех, кто найдет эту запись, я прошу отслужить молебен за наши души. Я также прошу забрать фамильные реликвии рода ван Дейн с Кьява Гамма. Реликвии хранятся..." — и капитан сообщила место и код фамильного хранилища.

languages.text: "Kiava Gamma has fallen. The Fireborn broke orbit under fire from an unknown enemy and left the system," said Captain van Dayne on the recording, with the tone of an officer reporting to her superiors. "We encountered pathological {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} activity. The crew is reporting failures in the Geller field system. The ship is doomed. Whoever finds this recording, I ask you to hold a prayer service for our souls. I also ask you to take the family relics of the van Dayne line from Kiava Gamma. The relics are stored..." The captain then specified the location of her family vault and the access code.

"Kiava Gamma has fallen. "We encountered pathological {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} activity. The crew is reporting failures in the Geller field system. The ship is doomed. The captain then specified the location of her family vault and the access code.

languages.text: «Kiava Gamma ha caído. La Nacida del Fuego atravesó la órbita bajo ataque de un enemigo desconocido y abandonó el sistema», dijo la voz de la capitana van Dayne en la grabación, con tono de oficial informando a sus superiores. «Hemos sufrido actividad patológica de {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}. La tripulación confirma fallos en el sistema de campo Geller. La nave está condenada. Ruego a quien encuentre esto que celebre un funeral por nuestras almas. También pido que recupere las reliquias familiares del linaje de los van Dyne de Kiava Gamma. Las reliquias están almacenadas en...». A continuación, la capitana indicó la ubicación de la cámara familiar y el código de acceso.
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma has fallen. languages.text: “基亚瓦伽马星已经沦陷，烈焰之子号遭到未知敌人的炮火攻击，已经离开了星系。”冯·戴恩舰长在录音中如是说道，她的语气仿佛是在向上级进行报告的军官一样。“我们遭遇了恐怖的{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}活动，船员们正在报告盖勒力场的受损状况。这艘船已经无药可救了，无论是谁找到这份记录，我只恳请你能为我们的灵魂祈祷。此外，我还希望你能将冯·戴恩家族的遗产从基亚瓦伽马星上带走。这些遗产存放在……”随后，戴恩舰长说出了家族金库的位置与访问密码。
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma has fallen. The Fireborn broke orbit under fire from an unknown enemy and left the system," said Captain van Dayne on the recording, with the tone of an officer reporting to her superiors. "We encountered pathological {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} activity. The crew is reporting failures in the Geller field system. The ship is doomed. Whoever finds this recording, I ask you to hold a prayer service for our souls. I also ask you to take the family relics of the van Dayne line from Kiava Gamma. The relics are stored..." The captain then specified the location of her family vault and the access code.

languages.text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマが墜落しました。ファイアボーンは未知の敵から砲撃を受けて軌道を破壊し、星系から離脱しています」と映像の中のヴァン・ダイン船長は、上官に報告する士官のような口調で話す。「病的な{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の活動に遭遇しました。クルーがゲラーフィールド星系の不具合を報告しています。船は破壊へ向かう運命です。この映像を見つけた方は誰でもいいので、私達の魂のために祈りを捧げてください。また、キアヴァ・ガンマからヴァン・ダイン線の一族の遺物を持ち帰るようにお願いします。遺物は保管しています…」そして船長は一族の金庫の場所とアクセスコードを述べた。
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma has fallen. The Fireborn broke orbit under fire from an unknown enemy and left the system," said Captain van Dayne on the recording, with the tone of an officer reporting to her superiors. "We encountered pathological {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} activity. The crew is reporting failures in the Geller field system. The ship is doomed. Whoever finds this recording, I ask you to hold a prayer service for our souls. I also ask you to take the family relics of the van Dayne line from Kiava Gamma. The relics are stored..." The captain then specified the location of her family vault and the access code.

traits.locale_text: 「キアヴァ・ガンマが墜落しました。ファイアボーンは未知の敵から砲撃を受けて軌道を破壊し、星系から離脱しています」と映像の中のヴァン・ダイン船長は、上官に報告する士官のような口調で話す。「病的な{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の活動に遭遇しました。クルーがゲラーフィールド星系の不具合を報告しています。船は破壊へ向かう運命です。この映像を見つけた方は誰でもいいので、私達の魂のために祈りを捧げてください。また、キアヴァ・ガンマからヴァン・ダイン線の一族の遺物を持ち帰るようにお願いします。遺物は保管しています…」そして船長は一族の金庫の場所とアクセスコードを述べた。

languages.text: "Kiava Gamma ist gefallen. Die Fireborn hat unter Beschuss durch einen unbekannten Feind den Orbit und anschließend das System verlassen", sagte Captain van Dayne in der Aufnahme, im Ton einer Offizierin, die ihren Vorgesetzten Bericht erstattet. "Wir sind auf pathologische {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Aktivitäten gestoßen. Die Crew meldet Ausfälle im Gellerfeld-System. Das Schiff ist dem Untergang geweiht. Wer auch immer diese Aufnahme findet, möge bitte einen Gebetsgottesdienst für unsere Seelen abhalten lassen. Außerdem bitte ich darum, die Familienrelikte der Linie van Dayne von Kiava Gamma zu holen. Die Relikte befinden sich ..." Es folgt eine exakte Angabe der Position der Familiengruft inklusive Zugangscode.
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma has fallen. The Fireborn broke orbit under fire from an unknown enemy and left the system," said Captain van Dayne on the recording, with the tone of an officer reporting to her superiors. "We encountered pathological {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} activity. The crew is reporting failures in the Geller field system. The ship is doomed. Whoever finds this recording, I ask you to hold a prayer service for our souls. I also ask you to take the family relics of the van Dayne line from Kiava Gamma. The relics are stored..." The captain then specified the location of her family vault and the access code.

Die Fireborn hat unter Beschuss durch einen unbekannten Feind den Orbit und anschließend das System verlassen", sagte Captain van Dayne in der Aufnahme, im Ton einer Offizierin, die ihren Vorgesetzten Bericht erstattet. "Wir sind auf pathologische {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Aktivitäten gestoßen. Die Crew meldet Ausfälle im Gellerfeld-System. Das Schiff ist dem Untergang geweiht. Wer auch immer diese Aufnahme findet, möge bitte einen Gebetsgottesdienst für unsere Seelen abhalten lassen. Außerdem bitte ich darum, die Familienrelikte der Linie van Dayne von Kiava Gamma zu holen. Die Relikte befinden sich ..." Es folgt eine exakte Angabe der Position der Familiengruft inklusive Zugangscode.

languages.text: « Kiava Gamma est tombée. Le Flamboyant a quitté son orbite sous les tirs d'un ennemi inconnu et fui le système, déclarait la capitaine van Dayne sur le ton d'un officier faisant un rapport à son supérieur. Nous avons ensuite rencontré une activité pathologique du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. L'équipage a signalé des défaillances critiques du champ de Geller. Le vaisseau est condamné. Si quelqu'un trouve cet enregistrement, je vous demande de bien vouloir prier pour nos âmes. J'aimerais également que vous emportiez les reliques de la famille van Dayne hors de Kiava Gamma. Elles sont entreposées... » La capitaine donna ensuite les coordonnées et le code d'accès de la chambre forte de sa famille.
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma has fallen. The Fireborn broke orbit under fire from an unknown enemy and left the system," said Captain van Dayne on the recording, with the tone of an officer reporting to her superiors. "We encountered pathological {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} activity. The crew is reporting failures in the Geller field system. The ship is doomed. Whoever finds this recording, I ask you to hold a prayer service for our souls. I also ask you to take the family relics of the van Dayne line from Kiava Gamma. The relics are stored..." The captain then specified the location of her family vault and the access code.

traits.locale_text: « Kiava Gamma est tombée. Le Flamboyant a quitté son orbite sous les tirs d'un ennemi inconnu et fui le système, déclarait la capitaine van Dayne sur le ton d'un officier faisant un rapport à son supérieur. Nous avons ensuite rencontré une activité pathologique du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}. L'équipage a signalé des défaillances critiques du champ de Geller. Le vaisseau est condamné. Si quelqu'un trouve cet enregistrement, je vous demande de bien vouloir prier pour nos âmes. J'aimerais également que vous emportiez les reliques de la famille van Dayne hors de Kiava Gamma. Elles sont entreposées... » La capitaine donna ensuite les coordonnées et le code d'accès de la chambre forte de sa famille.

languages.text: "Kiava Gama düştü. Ateşten, bilinmeyen bir düşmanın saldırısına uğrayınca yörüngeden ayrılıp sistemi terk etti." Kaptan van Dayne, üstlerine rapor veren bir subay edasıyla konuşmaya devam etti. "Patolojik {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} faaliyetlerine rastladık. Mürettebat, Geller Alanı sistemindeki arızalara dair rapor gönderiyor. Gemimizin sonu geldi. Bu kaydı kim bulur bilmiyorum ama... Sizden iki ricam olacak, öncelikle ruhlarımız için bir dua töreni düzenleyin lütfen. Bir de Kiava Gama'dan kalma, van Dayne soyuna ait aile yadigârlarını alın. Yadigârlar..." Kaptan, aile kasasının konumunu ve erişim kodunu paylaştı.
languages.original_text: "Kiava Gamma has fallen. The Fireborn broke orbit under fire from an unknown enemy and left the system," said Captain van Dayne on the recording, with the tone of an officer reporting to her superiors. "We encountered pathological {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} activity. The crew is reporting failures in the Geller field system. The ship is doomed. Whoever finds this recording, I ask you to hold a prayer service for our souls. I also ask you to take the family relics of the van Dayne line from Kiava Gamma. The relics are stored..." The captain then specified the location of her family vault and the access code.

traits.locale_text: "Kiava Gama düştü. Ateşten, bilinmeyen bir düşman tarafından saldırıya uğrayınca yörüngeden ayrılıp sistemi terk etti," diyen Kaptan van Dayne, üstlerine rapor veren bir subay edasıyla konuşmaya devam etti. "Patolojik {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g} faaliyetlerine rastladık. Mürettebat, Geller Alanı sistemindeki arızalar hakkında rapor gönderiyor. Gemimizin sonu geldi. Bu kaydı kim bulur bilmiyorum ama… Sizden iki ricam olacak, öncelikle ruhlarımız için bir dua töreni düzenleyin lütfen. Bir de Kiava Gama'dan kalma, van Dayne soyuna ait aile yadigârlarını alın. Yadigârlar…" Kaptan, aile kasasının konumunu ve erişim kodunu paylaştı.
